title: The Shifting Conditions Confronting The French Hostage Negotiator
teaser: Steve Inskeep speaks with Robert McFadden, a senior vice president of the Soufan Group and a 30-year veteran of U.S. law enforcement, for details on the security situation in and around Paris.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
